remarks: Definition of the set of positive integers.  For naming consistency with the Metamath Proof Explorer usages should refer to ~ dfnn2 instead. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Sep-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-inn $p |- NN = |^| { x | ( 1 e. x /\ A. y e. x ( y + 1 ) e. x ) } $.
$d x y $.
